ted_title: Workplace injuries and illnesses resulting in job transfer or restriction in 2017
ted_intro: Workers who suffer severe injuries or illnesses on the job may take days away from work to recover, or they may return to work immediately in a different job or with restricted tasks. The type and severity of the injury affect whether a worker takes time away to recover, returns to work on light or restricted duty, or transfers to another job while they recover. In 2017, sprains, strains, and tears were the most frequently occurring injuries resulting in lost worktime, transfer, or restriction in five of six industries studied. More of these cases resulted in days of job transfer or restriction than days away from work in crop production; transportation equipment manufacturing; and amusement, gambling, and recreation. In truck transportation, however, more of these injuries resulted in days away from work than job transfer or restriction.
ted_outro: These data are from the Injuries, Illnesses, and Fatalities program. To learn more, see “Employer-Reported Workplace Injuries and Illnesses — 2017.” We also have more information about cases involving days of job transfer or restriction.
ted_body: Workers who suffer severe injuries or illnesses on the job may take days away from work to recover, or they may return to work immediately in a different job or with restricted tasks. The type and severity of the injury affect whether a worker takes time away to recover, returns to work on light or restricted duty, or transfers to another job while they recover. In 2017, sprains, strains, and tears were the most frequently occurring injuries resulting in lost worktime, transfer, or restriction in five of six industries studied. More of these cases resulted in days of job transfer or restriction than days away from work in crop production; transportation equipment manufacturing; and amusement, gambling, and recreation. In truck transportation, however, more of these injuries resulted in days away from work than job transfer or restriction.
ted_table_title: Percent of work injuries and illnesses resulting in days away from work or job transfer or restriction, selected private industries, by nature of injury or illness, 2017

ted_body: Cuts and lacerations resulted in more cases of job transfer or restriction than days away from work in crop production and transportation equipment manufacturing. Fractures usually are severe injuries. In all six industries studied, workers who sustained fractures more often had days away from work than job transfer or restriction.

ted_title: Hoping to find some fair fares? A look at air passenger costs
ted_intro: As the new year begins, some may be relieved that the holiday traveling season is winding down, while others are starting to plan next year’s big trip. As anyone who has booked a flight can attest, airfares can vary widely over the seasons and years.
ted_outro: These data are from the Consumer Price Index and International Price programs. See our fact sheet for more information about import and export airfares. We also have more charts on consumer prices and import and export prices.
ted_body: As the new year begins, some may be relieved that the holiday traveling season is winding down, while others are starting to plan next year’s big trip. As anyone who has booked a flight can attest, airfares can vary widely over the seasons and years.
ted_table_title: 12-month percent change in airline fares, U.S. city average, all urban consumers, not seasonally adjusted

ted_title: Hoping to find some fair fares? A look at air passenger costs
ted_intro: As the new year begins, some may be relieved that the holiday traveling season is winding down, while others are starting to plan next year’s big trip. As anyone who has booked a flight can attest, airfares can vary widely over the seasons and years.
ted_outro: These data are from the Consumer Price Index and International Price programs. See our fact sheet for more information about import and export airfares. We also have more charts on consumer prices and import and export prices.
ted_body: From November 2017 to November 2018, consumer prices for airline fares were down 1.6 percent. That compares with a decline of 6.9 percent from April 2017 to April 2018.

ted_title: Hoping to find some fair fares? A look at air passenger costs
ted_intro: As the new year begins, some may be relieved that the holiday traveling season is winding down, while others are starting to plan next year’s big trip. As anyone who has booked a flight can attest, airfares can vary widely over the seasons and years.
ted_outro: These data are from the Consumer Price Index and International Price programs. See our fact sheet for more information about import and export airfares. We also have more charts on consumer prices and import and export prices.
ted_body: Import air passenger fares, or fares paid to foreign carriers by U.S. residents for international travel, were up 0.7 percent over the 12-month period ending November 2018. Import fares to Asia carriers led the way, up 2.2 percent.
